Result view

A long click on the result text, at the bottom, allows you to edit it before sharing.

When sharing the result, keep in mind that some apps (so far I\'ve spotted Facebook) will not allow sharing both text and image - for such situations, the result is copied to clipboard before sharing. You\'ll need to PASTE it in the target app yourself.

Will only be available when another application has called into Xsseract for OCR. Returns the result text to the original caller.

When taking images of text (documents, invoices ...) try as much as possible to get good lighting conditions and proper focus.

Image resolution is another factor that influences the correctness of the OCR process - higher resolutions will give better results at the expense of processing time.

Welcome to Xsseract!

This is an optical character recognition (OCR) application that aims at parsing images into usable text for sharing or use in other apps.

We only support English for now, but other languages will be added upon request.

You can always click the help action (depicted above) to get contextual help for the screen you\'re looking at, or [Menu > Tutorial] to return to this tutorial.

We kindly ask you to provide feedback.

Thanks!
